decks.notes: The main focus of this Jeskai Control deck is to maintain control of the game through card advantage, removal spells, and counterspells. The deck includes a variety of card draw options such as Consult the Star Charts and Meticulous Archive, along with removal spells like Lightning Helix and Inevitable Defeat. The deck also includes counterspells like No More Lies and Jeskai Revelation to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck aims to stall the game until it can establish a dominant position and close out the game with powerful finishers like Ultima and Day of Judgment.

This deck focuses on using a combination of removal spells, counter spells, and card draw to control the game and outvalue the opponent. By efficiently managing resources and disrupting the opponent's game plan, the deck aims to establish board control and eventually win through card advantage and powerful finishers. The key is to use bounce spells and counter magic to protect important cards and deal with threats, while card draw and mana ramp help to ensure consistency and leverage the deck's powerful late-game options.

The deck focuses on utilizing Aang and his allies to create a powerful combo that can quickly overwhelm opponents. By ramping up with Llanowar Elves and utilizing cards like Bramble Familiar and Badgermole Cub to protect key pieces, the deck aims to establish a strong board presence. Formidable Speaker and Interdimensional Web Watch provide additional support, while Airbender Ascension and Seam Rip offer powerful removal options. Oko, Lorwyn Liege can be used to disrupt opponent strategies. The mana base is designed to support the combo pieces and ensure consistency in executing the game plan.

The deck focuses on quickly establishing a board presence with low-cost creatures and generating advantage through card draw and mana ramp. It utilizes a mix of evasive threats and creatures with powerful abilities to pressure the opponent and control the board. The inclusion of cards like Quantum Riddler and Sentinel of Lost Lore allows for card advantage and versatility in combat. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy while maintaining enough resilience and card advantage to outlast opposing threats.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on quickly establishing board presence with efficient creatures like Badgermole Cub and Ouroboroid, supported by ramp from Llanowar Elves and removal spells like Bitter Triumph and Shoot the Sheriff. The deck aims to push damage early and finish off opponents with powerful finishers like Morlun, Devourer of Spiders. Earthbender Ascension and Hollowmurk Siege provide additional value and card advantage, while mana fixing from Fabled Passage and Wastewood Verge ensures smooth gameplay. Ba Sing Se and Restless Cottage offer flexibility and additional resources for the aggressive game plan.

This Jeskai Control deck focuses on controlling the board with removal spells like Lightning Helix and Inevitable Defeat, while also utilizing card advantage and manipulation with cards like Consult the Star Charts and Meticulous Archive. The deck aims to stall the game until it can establish a dominant position and win with powerful spells like Jeskai Revelation and Ultima. The mana base is carefully constructed to allow for the flexibility of casting both white, blue, and red spells effectively. The deck also includes a variety of utility lands to support its control strategy.

The deck focuses on building a strong board presence early on and overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures. By utilizing cards like Llanowar Elves and Gene Pollinator for ramp, along with powerful creatures like Ouroboroid and Spider Manifestation, the deck aims to quickly establish dominance. The inclusion of cards like Quantum Riddler and Formidable Speaker helps to maintain card advantage and tempo. With a mix of creatures, spells, and mana sources, the deck is versatile and capable of adapting to different situations while keeping the pressure on the opponent.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game by using counterspells, board wipes, and card advantage to disrupt the opponent's strategy. It focuses on stalling the game with cards like Day of Judgment and Stock Up, while controlling the opponent's board with spells like Get Lost and No More Lies. The deck also includes powerful finishers like Marang River Regent and Elspeth, Storm Slayer to close out the game. Ultimately, the goal is to outlast the opponent and overwhelm them with card advantage and powerful creatures.

This deck focuses on the synergy between Airbender Ascension and Aang, Swift Savior to create a powerful combo that allows for fast and versatile control of the battlefield. The inclusion of cards like Llanowar Elves and Doc Aurlock provide ramp and card draw support, while cards like Interdimensional Web Watch and Badgermole Cub offer additional protection and utility. The mana base is carefully curated to ensure smooth mana production and consistency in executing the combo. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a well-timed and strategic combination of cards to achieve victory.

The key concept of this Bant Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and use cards like Nature's Rhythm and Seam Rip to disrupt their game plan. The deck aims to quickly build a board presence with cards like Badgermole Cub and Formidable Speaker, while also having powerful finishers like Craterhoof Behemoth and Marang River Regent. By utilizing mana acceleration with Llanowar Elves and efficient mana fixing with lands like Hushwood Verge and Multiversal Passage, this deck aims to outpace and outmuscle the opponent before they can stabilize.

This Dimir Aggro deck focuses on utilizing low-cost aggressive creatures and disruptive spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By playing cards like Bitterbloom Bearer and Floodpits Drowner, the deck aims to apply pressure early in the game while also using cards like Spell Snare and Requiting Hex to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The inclusion of cards like Cecil, Dark Knight and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares allow for additional control options and powerful late-game threats. The deck also features a mix of lands to ensure consistent mana production and proper color requirements.

The deck focuses on building a board presence quickly and overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures. It utilizes cards like Badgermole Cub and Llanowar Elves to ramp up mana early on, while also including powerful creatures like Overlord of the Boilerbilges and Overlord of the Hauntwoods to dominate the battlefield. The deck contains a mix of creature buffs like Vibrance and powerful spells like Calamity, Galloping Inferno to deal significant damage. Additionally, cards like Vaultborn Tyrant and Ureni, the Song Unending provide additional threats to keep pressure on the opponent. The deck aims to win quickly through efficient creature combat and powerful spells.

The main theme of this deck is to control the game by using a combination of removal spells, counter spells, and card draw to outvalue the opponent. The deck aims to maintain board control through the use of efficient removal spells like Abandon Attachments and Combustion Technique, while generating card advantage through spells like Accumulate Wisdom and Artist's Talent. By utilizing cards like Iroh's Demonstration and Firebending Lesson, the deck can also create powerful board states that are difficult for the opponent to overcome. Overall, the strategy of this deck is to outlast the opponent and gradually take over the game.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and powerful spells. It aims to win the game by applying consistent pressure and reducing the opponent's life total as fast as possible. The deck includes a mix of efficient creatures like Abigale and Sunset Saboteur, along with disruptive cards like Bitter Triumph and Strategic Betrayal to control the board. Utilizing key mana cards like Unholy Annex and Realm of Koh, the deck aims to outpace the opponent and secure victory through a combination of creature attacks and spell damage.

The main goal of this deck is to use Omniscience to cast powerful spells for free and overwhelm the opponent with a combination of creatures and instants/sorceries. The deck includes cards that can help ramp up mana quickly and protect the player's board state. By utilizing cards like Roiling Dragonstorm and Uthros, Titanic Godcore, the player can create devastating combos that will help secure victory. The key strategy is to carefully manage resources and timing to execute the perfect sequence of plays for maximum efficiency.

The deck focuses on utilizing low-cost creatures with abilities that help generate value and tempo, supported by spells that provide additional utility and control. By efficiently utilizing mana ramp with cards like Llanowar Elves and Nature's Rhythm, the deck can quickly deploy threats such as Badgermole Cub and Ouroboroid. The inclusion of key spell cards like Spider-Sense and Bounce Off allows for disruption of opponent's strategies. The deck's mana base provides flexibility in casting spells and ensures consistency in executing aggressive and synergistic plays.
